text.text: ‼️ OUT-OF-CHARACTER TASK: Hide the Magic Essence
Take all the magical essence packages and bottles in the out-of-game room.
Hide them somewhere around the tavern and inn.
Hide the black and red ones in harder locations (but not too hard) and blue ones in relatively easy ones.
You may use the knowledge of the placement of these essences to observe if they've been taken and by whom.
But you may **NOT** take it, displace it, dispose of it or tell someone else about it once it is placed.
You are aware of the components needed to cast the spells.
Should you choose to cast any spell, you have to find the component required by the spell in question.
This essence can be found at some locations within the tavern and you have the ability to collect it.
Alternatively, you can get them at the dark market location somewhere within the tavern. But where?
